original: Kolmodin, Per Israel, leg. veterinär, Linköping, f. 29/5/11 i Sollentuna, Sthlms 1., av dir. Carl Israel K. o. 35 Tora Kander. G. 41 m. Ingrid Björkman. Barn: Hans f. 42, Håkan 44, Carl Gusitaif 47. — Stud:ex. v. norra real i Sthlm 31, •veit:ex. v. vet: hög sk. där 41. As’sist. v. statens vet :med. anst. 41-44, tj rgjort som tf. distr :vet. i oiliika distr. under kortare perioder 317-46 assist :vet. v. ös-tergötl. läns liuis-h :siälll’sk. s-ed. 44. Led. av flera vet:-fören. Hobiby: friluftsliv.
translated: Kolmodin, Per Israel, certified veterinarian, Linköping, b. 29/5/11 in Sollentuna, Stockholm County 1st district, son of director Carl Israel K. and Tora Kander, born in 35. Married in 1941 to Ingrid Björkman. Children: Hans, b. 1942, Håkan, b. 1944, Carl Gusitaif, b. 1947. Completed high school (Stud:ex.) at Norra Real in Stockholm in 1931, obtained veterinary degree (•veit:ex.) from the Veterinary College in 1941. Worked as an assistant at the State Veterinary Medical Institution from 1941-1944, temporarily served as acting district veterinarian in various districts from 1937-1946. Became an assistant veterinarian at the Östergötland County Animal Hospital in 1944. Member of several veterinary associations. Hobby: outdoor activities.
